values:
New Orleans is bleeding again
Such a shock to most
I could see you through the haze
Remember how I wished you'd wait
Cuz life has dealt every card to your advantage
I watch you dominate the game
Now I wonder, If I was shuffled anything at all
I've built my life around this city
Watched it wake slowly in the late hours
Was there something in the lights?
That created this blind robbery
Now I'm sucked in by the laughter
Deserted by this change
Why am I pulled straight to your eyes?
Their ruby glow, drowned in fame
I can't remain your faithful tourniquet
My ego can't recover
So watch the bayou, it's gentle shimmer
Lay down your ace of spades
This is tranquil
This ruin of all I am
I'm sorry, I cannot be your friend
I'm called elsewhere,
cuz
New Orleans is bleeding again.


<<comment>>
that last entry was written by me.  i think that's what my journal will be from  now on...so comment to my last entry and tell me what you think. suggestions are appreciated*

I tell myself that it's not fair for me
To see you while knowing
that I can't stop this spreading hiatus
I know what I have to do
But the light is telling, reminding me...
Of the risk that I'm taking
The equal chance of falling apart
into the open arms of lonliness
That I know and can feel all too well
The knife of regret is sharpening,
preparing me for a certain awakening
I'm face-down on the ground
Praying that you can feel my seemingly silent plea
For you to end this, to express-
Where your heart is sending you
Either way, my star-crossed path is
destining me to fall
Into you or to despair
Catch me, Kiss me
For my heart is waiting, crying
That you will turn your head and ignore the smoke-
To hear my heated call...
"What tho the odds be great or small."

Aaaah well it's 1:02 in the afternoon and I actually decided to update my journal today...and not with a dumb quiz or 5-word entry.  Yeah so ladies & gentlemen, enjoy...
Tonight may be the array of one of two events.  I might go to the fair with Carolyn...or I might to go Olean to see The Notenook with the crew.  I don't know which yet, so I'm still deciding.  School starts in 24 days.  Aaaaah...I canot express how badly I just want this Summer to continue.  The worst thing about next year is going to be that fact that I have to get up at 6 every morning.  Man...I swear, I'm gonna die.  I did the usual routine of talking to Kelly until the wee hours of the morning last night.  I miss her sooo much.  I say that every day, and I don't see a reason to stop now.  I really wanna go to the school in South Carolina with her next year but it's way too late and it would just be easier for me to stay here for my sophomore year.
Carolyn leaves in like 2 weeks tog o to Lock Haven,and Val leaves on the 15th.  I'm gonna miss them so much.  I don't really like to be all alone in my house.  It's really weird without always haveing Cari to talk to.  Oh well, I guess I'll have to stick it out like I did last year.
My new favorite movie is Finding Nemo.  It's so awesome.  I love fish, they're cool.  Finding Nemo is jsut the best movie ever.  I don't know what else to say, I really don't.
Anyways, I'm getting ready to burn a cd with all the Something Corporate songs that arent's on their albums.  It's a total of 20 songs and it's gonna be great.  all their really good stuff is Underground. =)
Anyways, there's not too much more to say other than the fact that I'm going to Erie tomorrow with Carolyn to Waldameer and to get a head start on school clothes.  It's gonna be good, cuz me and Car haven't had a road trip in quite a while.  
So I'll talk to everyone later, and have an awesome day.

<3Lauren

btw, leave comments...if you're reading this- COMMENT, it's the least you could do. ;)

Well today wasn't too eventful...Not too long til I'm outta her and off to school once again.  I've just been kinda out of it lately since KB...I'm just SOOOO exhausted....But if you wanna leave me a comment and make me feel awesome, go for it!  
I miss Kelly...waaah.
Call me Chami...

Later...I'll write more tomorrow.

<3 Laur

Vote LOUD 2004
if for no other reason then to keep John Kerry from winning.

i love geroge bush.
and if you don't,
remove yourself from my journal.
if you hate our country,
then is it that difficult for you to move to a better one?
oh wait, we're the most powerful, most organized, and most free country in the world.
my mistake...
ingrateful fools.

I am very frustrated and sad right now because Brandon was supposed to come over and he totally isn't here.  Oh well thoug, it's ok I guess.
Tomorrow is kingdom bound at darien lake and i severely don't wanna go.  Like I REALLLLLY don't want to.  but my mom is forcing me, so I will be tortured into going.  I just burnt the AAr cd, and got the cool soco cd yesterday so I'll be severely entertained the whole way up.  Yay, then it won't be so bad.  Taking Back Sunday may save my life as well.  
Anyways, how is everyone?  Not that much has happened.  I went to Olean with Brandon, Fleedix, and Val last night and it was fun.  But I had a horrible headache on the way up and I puked onthe side of the road.  Then ym awesome boyfriend went to buy me Motrin from Walmart...isn't he a sweetie?  yesss...And we were gonna go see The Village but it was sold out.  So we ended up buying the movie GIA at sam goody.  It was retarded in my opinion...but apparently everyone loved it.  Oh well, I'm just very....square.  
Sarah just called and is on her way to get the movie GIA and take it to her house to watch with some people...man o mna, ok the movie sucked?  Obviously no one knows that...Oh well, I still love ya Sarah...Tell Wistopher I say hi.  Because he's adorable and totally my husband.  Come on, the cat slept on my chest man...what an awesome feline.  
Anyways, before this gets totally pointless...I'm gonna jet.
Might I add that I saw Lizz today at Costa's and it was awesome!  She's the best lol...ttyl everyone*

<3Lauren
wish me luck to the sufferage of tomorrow...aaah =(

Wow, it's been kinda crazy lately, and I really wanna go school shopping.  
I miss Kelly a lot and it's really gonna suck when she leaves.  It's bad enough having her in WV all Summer, and when she goes to BLS it's gonna be like my best friend is totally removed from my life.  Aaaah what am I gonna do?  I definitley will have to visit you Chami, and I love you soo much cuz you're such an awesome person and completley the best friend I've ever had.  We're gonna stay best friend wherever you go, ok? =(
Erikka is also one of the coolest people ever because she burnt me a mix of Taking Back Sunday.  Awesome, huh?  And she bought me a ring and gives me clothes.  She is so awesome to talk to, and has the coolest unique personality.
As you can see, I'm really in the mood to praise everyone.  So I'll continue...Jesse is really cool and I haven't gotten to talk to him in a while, so I miss ya J!!!!  He definitley knows good music from bad...and good hair, most of the time.
Brandon is sooo amazing and I can tell him anything and he's just always there despite everything..heart ya B.
Fleedix was in a bad mood on Tuesday but I love her too...You're truly my sister darling.
Bekah is awesome, as eveyone knows.  We have had so many good times and I just love her for always backing me up and being such a positive influence all the tiem and sticking with me through evvvverything.
Scott is a cool Houghton guy and I haven't talked to him in forever...I miss you Scottietoohottie!  You're soo rad. ;)
MIKE AND JESSE are the best guys ever.  They are so nice and Christian and hilarious and nice and just everything with a cherry on top.  I love them and couldn't lie without them, seriously.  Love you guys.

Ok I'm done...I love everyone!  So if I haven't talked to you in a while, it's cuz I'm busy and not ignoring you, since I'vebeen accused of that recently...
Have an awesome day.

<3 Lauren

OHOHOH...I'm having an Aladdin party today..all by myself I am watching Aladdin and Return Of Jafar...cool huh?  I wish KELLY were here to watch them with me. =( =(

well my life has been semi-frenzetic.
brandon-feel better!
kelly im gonna freaking miss you like a freaking lot like freaking all year while youre in freaking south carolina!
bye!

Wow, it's been a while since I REALLY put anything in here.  Wow.  So I'm going to this smorning, since I can't get back to sleep.  I can't really believe that it's almost August.  I don't want school to start at all.  Like seriously...like a freakin lot.  I still have to go shopping and all that good stuff.  That's the only good part of the fall, clothes.  I don't know what kind aof shoes I want this year though.  I'm thinkin Vans.  Who knows though, ths sky is the limit.  Last night I went golfing with Bekah and Brandon...Donnie Darko is a really good movie.  everyone should watch it.  My Kelly is  now in South Carolina visiting a school.  I miss her, and I wanna go see her.  Anyone wanna take me!?  I'm seriously in love with Ryan Gosling...I accept him for who he is, from Flash Forward to The Notebook...:)  Don't you?  Oh wait you shouldn't because he's mine.  Anyways, there's really nothing else for me to say...So leave me a comment and it'll make me happy...that's what you want isn't it!?!?! ;);)
~Lauren*

Seriously, this summer has sucked so bad.
Nothing has happened.
Nothing good atleast.
My mom keeps threatening to send me back to Houghton, as if.
Atleast my hair is blonde.
Oh yes it is.
Is yours?
Are you Tyson Ritter?
If you are, I love you baby! ;)
Leave me a comment...or I shall stab you with a herring.
*sigh.*

Chao
-Lauren

Hi!  I haven't written in LJ for a while....but now I'm back and on track!  Anyways, 2 nights ago I went swimming with some people at Houghtailings...And I've been chillin with BWC a lot...And I really need out of this town...cuz it's getting really annoying.  And I definitley don't want to come here for school next year.  And it's too late to appy to TFS...so I'm stuck here.  Grr.  My hair is really blonde now.  Cuz I got it done yesterday and I really like it.  I will never go back to being a brunette,  Awww Tay is laying right on Val's butt right now....and sinking in his claws...whoo.  I really like Something Corporate...and A Perfect Circle and Breaking Benjamin are amazing too.  Everyone should listen to them, because I say so fuahaha.  

Ok I'm gonna go...LEAVE ME A COMMENT TO MAKE MY DAY! =*(
"This isn't about kepping a promise...it's about following your heart." ~The Notebook

Lauren
btw...Texas Chainsaw Massacre is really scary!

I don't really have much to say other than the fact that:
I need to get out of here.

Nothing much has happened....hi to everyone.
Erikka's mom is...a rabbit what!?

Hi!  This is probably going to be short because I'm getting sick of livejournal.  Yep I am.  But anyway, last night I went to the fireworks in Olean with Brandon and Brett.  Brett's a good driver even though he's only 15 and calls me fat.  Brandon needs to work on his turning skills...but I love them both anyway.  Would you believe that I'm listening to Ashlee Simpson right now?  Probably not, but I am.  I must really deserve to be stabbed because this is crazy.  I don't listen to girl music artists.  I never cease to surprise myself do I?  I'm in the mood for a road trip...Like to some random place in New York.  Anyone wanna take me?  And I also really wanna learn how to surf.  I could so pull off the whole surfer girl look dontcha think?  

Onto a more important matter:  The packet from the school in Georgia came yesterday.  I love that school so much.  It's so amazing and beautiful and big and awesome.  Now after I get accepted (which I hope I will).....I'll have to decide which school to go to next year.  Here or down in the South.  And I have no idea which one to pick.  So help me out and tell me where I should go.  Lydia already thereatened to kill me if I don't go to Coudersport...And Kelly threatened to kill me if I do.  So AAAAAAAH....

LEAVE A FREAKING COMMENT FOOLS!

~Lauren (Laurice)

Wow, my computer is finally working again!  Yay.  Well I haven't really done much lately.  I went golfing with Kid Rock and Erikka last night.  Erikka likes Pa's ketchup and pickles.  Aaaah many good times.  I'm jamming out to John Mayer and he's so amazing.  I need tosee him in concert again.  I wish I could play guitar.  I can't wait til my lessons start!  Whoo...Then me and John Mayer can play together.  I have to work tomorrow, aaah I don't want to.  I need a new job like sitting in a nice, clean room doing absolutley nothing.  

I'm contemplating on whether or not I wanna go to Olean tonight.  Yep.

I realllly like Dashboard right now...And Tbs, and everyone that I've ever really liked in my life.  And I have Love Song stuck in my head severely.  It's so good...I WILL ALWAYS LOVE YOU...then the guitar solo...man o man.  

I wish I was going to camp right now.  *sigh*  The most I can do is go to see everyone at the concert!  Like Colleen and Nick and Jaret!  Yeeeah baby.  I might go to Ashley's tonight, and then the fireworks are tomorrow!  Awesome, cuz they're like the best thing about the fourth of July.

Ok, before this gets too long, I'm gonna go!  Later gators =)

<3 Lauren!

Well today is alright.  I have church at 7...and I basically didn't do anything all day.  I went and watched court for this summer career thing that I forgot I signed up for.  And now I'm just chillin and listening to the All American Rejects....they're so awesome.  And the lead singer is perfect in every way...(hence the picture..*squeals*)  Andrew McMahon may have some competition.  

Fleedix is awesome and I know that she's goin through a lot right now, and I love her!  And she knows that if sh eneeds somebody I'm right here.  :)

Great.  Now Bekah's gone camping...I miss her already lol.  She's borrowing my sunglasses because they're awesome and no one has any like them.  Sweetness.  

Should I get small red streaks in my hair?  Message me or leave a comment with your input.  Ooooh the preview for Ocean's 11 is on.  I love that movie.  That's what I'll do!  I'll watch that...ok I just put it in...clap for me.  I'm insanely jealous of Jesse because he can get smoothies and milkshakes whenever he wants.  What a fool...aaah.  So I'm gonna go, COMMENT!  IF YOU'RE READING THIS, YOU MUST LEAVE A COMMENT.

~Lauren

btw...I just found out that one of my friend's mom has cancer....pray for her and her family.

Today is an infatuating day so far.  I had a lesson that I did surprisingly well at...I am proud of myself.  Then I came back here- and now I plan on taking a nap because I was woken up at freaking 9:30...Dodgeball is hilarious, everyone should see it.  And if you were there last night and heard someone clapping it wasn't me...*blushes and crawls into fetal position*  AAAAH the fetal position...man o man.  I'm so tired, and in a few sentences I will be totally incoherant so leave me many comments!  And!  Ok I forgot what I was gonna say...hmm...Well I hope your surgery went well Jesse!  Haha and you're prolly entirely knocked out right now.  And I hope that Fleedix is feeling better! Bye! 

"I'm not going to look back
White it out like glittering wax butterflies"

~Lauren

Tonight I'm going mimigolfing (yay) with Bekah and Ashley...then Brandon's showing up around 10.  Yay, gonna be good times with my kids.  Leave a comment or I will be heartbroken.

I wish someone would follow me around all day playing the guitar and singing songs to me.  Anyone need a job!? ;)  Oh you have to be goodlooking, lol...so yeahhh.

I love Knostantine...it's so addicting on the piano!

-Lauren

Today was alright...not much to say.  I think I'm going to Ashley's...or having my passe over, who knows.  TBS officially makes me depressed.  Lol, doesn't all emo music?  And I have to say that I have developed a mutual respect for Weezer.  But I do NOT like them....yet.  Just let that be known.  Anyways, leave me lots of comments.  Lots and lots.  Yeah, later- 

I need someone who:
   -Wears random old Western shirts that used to belong to his Dad.
   -Goes on the boardwalk to play games and win cheap sunglasses.
   -Can make a trip to walmart the best day of your life.
   -Can sing in the car.
   -Can break me apart then put me back together.
   -Can sing Konstantine better than Andrew...
   - =) =), Philadelphia dreamin'

I babysat Mike and Jesse's little sisters today.  It was awesome!  They're the best elem-schoolers that I know, lol...I wanna go somewhere in the middle of the night tonight...cuz I'm sick of being here, *sigh*...And leave me a comment...It would be virtuous.  Aaaah...Anyways...I really like Flickerstick.  That I do.  gonna go.  bye.

Lauren

Oooooh- btw!  Isn't this picture great!?  I love it.
AND...LEAVE COMMENTS!  to my entry below this one. =)

Well today is good.  It's 11:00 and I WOULD still be sleeping, but Carolyn felt the need to come into my room and wake me up because she slaved over a hot stove to make me coffee...*sigh*...And in an hour and a half, my hair will become sooo blonde that you won't even believe it.  I'm psyched!  Yay!  I love Harry Potter- he's muy caliente.  Wow, is anything going down for tomorrow yet?  I'm really tired, but I can never go back to sleep after someone wakes me up.  Anyways, I really wanna go to school in Georgia next year.  It would be so awesome, because Val is going to school right above us, and then Carolyn is going to Georgia State for the the second semester.  Annnnd, it's really close to Myrtle Beach- aaah I love that place, tans come every 2 seconds in N.C.  anyways- I'm in love with TBS...And SoCo...And Thursday...Yes I am.  My new boyfriend is named Andrew McMahon, he's the lead singer of Something Corporate- have you heard of them?  He's really hot, and he sends me presents.  He's buying me a house in California where we can get married on the beach and I can play Konstantine while he sings it.  He dedicated that song to me actually...Umm I just told him to name it Konstantine.  Ok I'm gonna stop, I'm not in the mood to be this depressed, lol- but it's true-all of it!  I would never lie to you- evurrr.  Ok bue yeah I'm gonna go...I think I wanna change my colors to something else red.  Because red matches my pictures fuahahaha.  But yeah- have una dia excelente ya'll!  Oh Guess what?  Brandon got a new car, he's so fly, lol. =)  Later!

-Lauren

"I went on vacation and took Hannah to the abyss...and you're supposed to be the co-owner and you WEREN'T EVEN THERE!" -Jesse Fink, sorry J =(

Aaaah I really don't feel like writing in this today.  I'm in the mood for a road trip.  Lata--
~Laurenn+

Wow, today I was up and at 'em at 8:30 babysitting for three very active people.  Then I had the hardest violin lesson of my life, because now all my etudes are in third position.  Yipee Skipee.  Now I have to go to choir practice until 9:00.  Aaaah, I'm like totally spinning out, I can't even express.  But yeah, I'm like totally resorting to SoCo to heal everything, lol.  I love them, theyre amazing.  But don't i say that every day?  Guster is really good too.  As is Flogging Molly.  As are many things.  But yeaaah....I was out in the sun A LOT today so I'm like seriously tan, it's quite awesome.  And I have my hair appointment Thursday, and I'm getting it super blonde.  My goal of being blonde and tan this summer is actually gonna come true- *squeals*!  But I better gooo...OH OH OH!  I drove for 7 miles today...*sigh* I majorly need my permit now...too bad I have to wait.  Later Gators+

-Lauren

Well today's heavenly.  I have nothing to do because this is a resting day before tomorrow when i have to babysit 3 small toddlers all day long.  Pray for me.  Anyways, Carolyn went to Pitt with Craig today.  So I'm lonely, but I still have Val.  I have the best siblings ever.  Anyways, it's 12:12 and I just woke up.  I made coffee then came straight here.  I think a shower sounds fun!  So I'll get right on that, have a lovely day.  I changed my default picture!...It's Andrew, yes it is.  OMG, I went to this website that said that McMahon was a Cuomo wannabe.  I was so mad.  That makes no sense because Weezer and SoCo are nothing alike, they're from totally different genres.  I was furious...but then I went to the guestbook and read all these entries that people put yelling at them and saying Andy was better.  Ok that had absolutley no point.  I'm still kinda dreaming.  I woke up in my sister's room behind her bookshelf with a pillow I had never seen.  I NEVER sleepwalk...so I'm kinda creeped out.  Maybe it was my stalker...who knows.  Gonna go bye cya later.

<3 Laur

"It's not what it seems
It's exactly what you think it is."
Ok the picture changed on me, and its actually from 'if you c jordan' so dont think i know nothing about my favorite band! =)

Wow, today was good.  Tom is having a concert tonight at the church! YAYY!  I love Tom.  And I saw the most amazing, perfect, gorgeous, smart, wonderful guy today.  He looks JUST like the lead singer of Something Corporate.  Yeah but he's in  so screw that.  And I'll never see him again cuz he's not from here.  *Tear*  But yeah, IF YOU DIDN'T FOWNLOAD 'FALL' BY SOMETHING CORPORATE, DO IT NOW....please.  It's so amazing and by far the best song I have ever heard in my life...on sooo many levels.  Guys that can sing are just sexy.  And Blue eyes are appreciated.  But yeah I'm gonna gp- lalalalalater!  Oh, and my picture is from Konstantine, and it's Andrew McMahon.  And if you don't know who that is, you might as weel resort to Weezer or Jet.  
Bye,
Lauren

Well I'm still here at the Minors babysitting 3 under kindergarten age.  Need I say more?  Well all I really have to say is that I found the most awesome song today.  Anyone that's anyone should download it.  Do you hear me!?  That means everyone.  It's called "Fall" by Something Corporate.  It is the theme song of my life and is so amazing that I can't stop listening to it.  It's sooo great.  If you don't download it, I'm not your friend.  That's all I'll say about that.  Anyways, my day has been long...Atleast now I'll be like 50 dollars richer.  Amen to that.  But yeah, I'm quite distraught about some things right now....So I'll talk to the world when I'm back and on track at my own house.

<3 Lauren

Umm...download that song, please.!.
I don't know what to feel.

Wow, today was good.  I went to Olean with Carolyn and my Mom.  I got many new clothes, and that's great.  But the best thing that I got was the first Something Corporate CD, 'Leaving from the window.'  It is AMAZING!  Seriously, it's awesome.  Like all the songs have subtle differences from the ones that you can download on the internet.  So go buy it, now!  Anyways:

I'm definitley feeling the fact that I love A Perfect Circle.  I need someone who shares the love for them and Tool. =( I feel alone in the world like I'm the only one who likes them.  Wah.  

But the point I want to get across is that everyone should leave me a comment, and OH OH OH!  CHECK MY PICTURE PAGE!  GO TO THE YOUTH CONVENTION GALLERY BECAUSE IT'S BRAND NEW!  You'll be highly entertained!  Anyways, I'm gonna hit the pavement, umm or sidewalk?  Oh wait, they're both pavement.  Whateva.  Bye Later Cya Adios.  -LAUREN

"I was so close
That was the most that I have ever been through
Now old cassettes and cigarettes
Will be the ones to save you
How can you ask for me to stay?
When all you ever do is go
Just Go."

I'm the best sister ever- I made Carolyn and Val breakfast in bed this morning...That includes: eggs, toast, bacon, coffee, orange juice, etc.  Aren't I nice?  Then I cleaned my entire kitchen- I'm awesome.  Yeahhh baby.  Anyways, today has potential to be a very good day.  I'm going to Olean with some cool kida to develop my camers (so check check check out my pic page later tonight).  And then I reallly wanna see the new hp movie but I can't because I promised Vrandon that I wouldn't see it without him.  I'm such a good friend aren't I?  Yes I am.  Me and Kelly really need to find a new school.  Last night I listened to all the cds that I bought when I was in Houghton (LP rean., Chevelle, Trapt), and they all reminded me of school there and put me in the weird state of mind that I was in while I was going there, and I hated it.  I couldn't even finish the cds.   I wanted to break them really bad.  God, that freaking place even affected my interpretation fo 3 perfectly good cds.  And to think that I wanted to go BACK there.  Wow, I'm never setting foot there as long as I live.  Too many bad things happened to me there.   I like Coudersport somewhat.  But I'll leave it at that.  Anyways, yeah...I love Kelly.  And she loves me and we're the coolest kids ever.  Anyways, please leave me a comment.  That means if you're reading this, leave one.  Even if you don't like me.  Even if I don't like you.  As in certain coudy ppl, lol.  Derek likes pink dresses, and he leaves soon :(....He's the coolest and I'm gonna miss him.  But yeah, I wish I could be like Carolyn and putmyself in a box...or name your member Princess Sophia...ok I'll stop there, lol, watch How To Lose A Guy In 10 Days and you'll understand!...gotta go cya bye later

+Lauren+

"I'm not the one who broke you, I'm not the one you should fear.."

Lol, I love people that I have on my list sheerly for entertainment factor!  HELLOOOO!

If you didn't catch on, my picture on livejournal is Ryan Gosling in my favorite move- Murder By Numbers!  It's been my favorite movie for like 2 years and I reallly like it.  It's when he goes to Lisa as she's walking and is like "NYYYAAAAAAAAH-AH"...ok I'll stop, watch it and you'll understand!  Bye!  I love Kelly! <3 Lauren

Wow it's 1:00 and I have til 2 to get ready to finish babysitting...aaah!  But I love Lauren Minor she's awesome, for many reasons including the fact that she has the coolest first name ever invented.  Yeaaah baby.  I'm swimming for the first time all summer today!  Yay!  It'll be umm...fun!  Yip Yip.  I mean Hip Hip.  Whateva.  LEAVE ME A FREAKING COMMENT OR DIE!  I have a whole camera to develop so check my page out sometime this week and look at all the pretty pictures.  See my sister and feel sick because you're not as cool as her.  Well I'm gonna hit the pavement.  Later-

Lauren

"Maybe this time I can follow through-
I can feel complete- 
Stop paying dues."

I'm in love with Something Corporate.  I can't even express it, they're music just tears e apart-but I still prevail! *darts eyes around*  Brandon left for NC yesterday, and he better now forget to not see the Harry Potter movie until he gets back and takes me to Olean like he promised! ;)  Today was alright- I had a violin lesson and picked apart the song for districts.  It's soooo hard- but I'm actually getting it a lot more.  I wanna keep playing the violin but seriously- I'm not doing it in college or anything, oh well...Me and Kelly are finding a new boarding school to go to, oh wait I already said that.  By the way, everyone!  Leave me a nice comment on my journal...or you shall pay with you very life.  Is that a large enough threat?
